00003 struct matrix {
00004         char    input[255];             /* input character */
00005         float   conversion[255][255];   /* conversion cost, in, out positions */
00006         float   insertion[255][255];    /* cost of inserting, in, out positions */
00007 };

00009 #ifndef max
00010 #define max(a,b) ((a) >= (b) ? (a) : (b))
00011 #endif  /* max */
00012 
00013 #ifndef min
00014 #define min(a,b) ((a) <= (b) ? (a) : (b))
00015 #endif  /* min */

00019     size_t len2);

00022     size_t len2);

00025     size_t digest_len);
